args.text: The article discusses the top 50 bucket list travel destinations in the world, as determined by a survey of Big 7 Travel's social media audience. Bali topped the list, followed by New Orleans, Kerry in Ireland, Marrakesh in Morocco, and Sydney. The destinations include cities, beaches, and natural landscapes, with 22% having white sandy beaches and 52% being iconic cities. The author provides brief descriptions of each destination, highlighting their unique features and attractions. The study found that people were more likely to add a destination to their bucket list if they had seen it on social media, and 33% of people research vacation destinations on their Instagram feed.
